description: The neem tree (Azadirachta indica) is an amazing species of tree. Its leaves, bark, fruits, and roots are used in traditional medicines to treat a wide range of illnesses, from skin disorders to digestive conditions. Rich in antioxidants and anti-inflammatories, extracts from neem tree have been shown to kill bacteria, fungi, and viruses, thus making it a natural and potent antibiotic. Neem leaves are also used to bolster immunity and health. Additionally, its bark containing metabolites can have powerful anti-diabetic, antipyretic, and anti-ulcer properties. As such, neem is an incredible species of tree, capable of offering a wide range of benefits to human health.
